title: AI-Enhanced Remote ICU Patient Monitoring System
description: "Vital Care", A comprehensive ICU patient monitoring system designed for real-time tracking and alerting of critical patient conditions in ICU settings using the NEWS2 scoring system and rule-based alerts.
features: Real-time vital sign monitoring alerting based on predefined thresholds
Automatic classification of patients into risk categories (Low, Medium, High) using NEWS2 scoring
Role-based views for doctors and nurses
Automated customizable alert system for critical and borderline vital signs
Note-keeping and patient discharge functionality
Data visualization with chart and table views for vital sign trends
This was done for my final year research project and got selected for the TIDAC research symposium 2024 at NSBM

title: Learning Management System for Anuka Jagoda Physics Academy
description: A comprehensive web-based LMS tailored for Anuka Jagoda Physics Academy to manage online classes, student performance, and academic content efficiently. The system supports seamless learning experiences for both students and instructors, featuring real-time progress tracking and content delivery.
features: Course creation and management for physics curriculum
Student enrollment and progress tracking
Video lectures and resource uploads for each module
Quiz and assignment management with auto-grading
User-friendly dashboard for instructors and students
Role-based access for admin, teacher, and student accounts
Real-time performance analytics and reports
Notifications and reminders for class schedules and deadlines

title: HAS Apparel – Modern Clothing Store
description: HAS Apparel is a stylish and functional eCommerce platform for a contemporary clothing brand. It features a customer-centric online store alongside a dedicated management system for handling inventory, orders, and product listings seamlessly.
features: Modern online storefront for browsing and purchasing apparel
Product categorization by gender, type, and collection
Real-time inventory and order management platform
Secure customer registration and checkout flow
Admin dashboard for managing products, stock, and order statuses
Mobile-optimized responsive design
Integrated payment gateway and email notifications

title: Medical Laboratory Management System
description: A comprehensive web-based management system developed for Medisense Laboratory Pvt Ltd, designed to streamline and automate operations across all departments of the laboratory.
features: Cashier and reception management
Doctor and patient record management
Separate modules for mini lab, main lab, and x-ray processing
Test result management and reporting
Customer and agency management
User role-based access and permissions

title: FutsalHub – Futsal Match and Player Management System
description: FutsalHub is a modern web application built to manage futsal matches, players, and team activities within a futsal club. It simplifies the coordination of games, player availability, and performance tracking through an intuitive, real-time interface.
features: Schedule and manage futsal matches with ease
Player registration and team assignment
Track player attendance and performance stats
Match history and upcoming game calendar
Admin and player roles with secure access
Match results and player voting system
Clean and responsive UI optimized for mobile and desktop

title: Event and Inventory Management System for Weddings By Sonali
description: A web-based system developed to streamline event planning and inventory management for Weddings By Sonali, an event planning company. This application facilitates efficient handling of both inventory and event operations, enhancing organization and management capabilities.
features: Event scheduling and management for various types of events
Inventory tracking and control with notifications for low stock
User-friendly dashboard for event and inventory overview
Role-based access for admin and staff
Real-time status updates for events and resources
Integration of event calendar and resource management
Reports generation for event summaries and inventory usage

title: Vehicle Renting Website
description: "Burgeon Tours", A responsive website for booking vehicles for trips, with automatic cost estimates based on start and end locations using Google Maps APIs.
features: Vehicle booking for trips and journeys
Cost estimation based on location inputs
Inquiries and messaging about rides
Fully mobile-responsive design

title: Vehicle Inspection System
description: A web-based application used by "Green Light", a vehicle inspection company, to record detailed inspection results for each vehicle part, generating comprehensive reports on the vehicle's overall condition.
features: Detailed part-by-part inspection recording
Automated report generation on overall vehicle condition
Searchable inspection history for past records
User-friendly interface for inspectors

title: Supercar Store Platform
description: "Luxury Rides", A comprehensive web-based platform for a supercar store, including a client-facing website for browsing available cars and a management system for store operations.
features: Client website to view available supercars and specifications
Email-based inquiry system for clients
Store management system for CRUD operations on car listings
Real-time updates between client website and management system
Inquiry response functionality for store owners
